attributes.title: My house caught on fire because of this app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what old people were up to nowadays. To say the least... Iâ€™m thoroughly disappointed and disgusted by what happened. First off, the app took ages to download - probably the reason why everybody who uses it is a boomer! I think I aged 5x quicker while waiting for this app to download. Also, when waiting, I had this strange urge to yell racial and homophobic slurs, along with sexist name calling like â€œdishwasherâ€ and â€œmaidâ€. So weird because Iâ€™m a girl! I also had this thought to pepper spray peaceful protesters just to get a photo with the Bible... but Iâ€™m not religious... so strange. When I finally downloaded it, i go to open the app and was not happy with what happened. Iâ€™m met with a disgusting, wrinkly, orange faced Cheeto. I could practically hear the racism through the screen. I was so scared... I thought I downloaded a boomer app, not The Conjuring. After I realized that I was in fact not playing 5 nights at Freddieâ€™s (I actually thought trump was one of those robots - specifically the chicken) I go to sign up. I suspect that my phone couldnâ€™t handle the homophobic vibes the app was giving off, so it started to overheat. I thought nothing of it until the heat that radiated off my phone caused my bed to catch on fire. I think itâ€™s because of the white supremacy. You know how light (light is white just so uneducated people know) can be so strong that it can cause things to heat up. Yeah, well this is the same case. The thought of White supremacy causes many white people to not see what is really happening around them. They only see problems of white people and are blind to many racial issues around the world. White supremacy blinds people Kinda like light. Anyway, the white supremacy vibe was so strong that it created a fire. Eventually, the fire grew just like the amount of children that trump rapes everyday. Now Iâ€™m homeless. I do not recommend this app. I also heard that trump wants to ban tiktok... ALL APPS MATTER!

attributes.title: This app is pure watery diarrhea
attributes.userName: Do you hear us Mr. Trump?
attributes.review:
This app is awful. The second i downloaded this app, loud sirens started blaring throughout my house. My lights even began flickering and turned to the color RED! After i sat on my bed in shock for about 30 seconds, i heard the screams of my family downstairs and knew i had made a grave mistake. I jumped up to see what was happening and as I rounded the corner at the bottom of the stairs I saw something with jaundiced, orange skin and a look of pure madness and peace on his face. Iâ€™ve never been more terrified in my life. I felt that if I stared into its eyes something unimaginably gruesome would happen to me. My whole family was laying flat on their stomachs on the ground who seemed to be humming a song Iâ€™d never heard before. As i looked up, tears soundlessly running down my face, I asked him the only question I could imagine asking. â€œWhat have you done?â€ I said, my voice shaking, not allowing me to sound brave like I wanted. It stared at me with cold, empty eyes and gravelly said, â€œWhy wouldnâ€™t I? You all have such a beautiful home and I would like to have itâ€ 
It was then I realized, that when evil decides to do what it does, it either has everything or nothing to lose. I believe everyone could agree that itâ€™s not the latter. This means when this disgusting creature is torn apart for its crimes, there will hopefully be a moment where it feels the grief of everyone and everything that he is wronged. And, if if violence is not the thing that kills him, it will be his own mind that does.
